meaningMnemonic:
<kanji>Industry</kanji> <kanji>actions</kanji> are things industries do. The actions of industry create a lot of <vocabulary>construction</vocabulary>, whether it be the construction of items or the construction of roads, factories, and more.

工事 commonly refers to <vocabulary>construction work</vocabulary>, especially for buildings, roads, and other infrastructure projects. Depending on the context, it can also refer to repairs or upgrades of physical structures, including electrical systems, plumbing, heating and cooling systems, and even smaller-scale installations like carpets or phone lines.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
